name: Bravo Example: Skeleton loading
description:
Made for Bravo Studio.


Create Skeleton loading screens in your Bravo app with this sample Figma file.

The file includes layers named with Bravo Tags, containers, and other essential setups.


To see the final result, create a project in Bravo Studio with this Figma file and preview it with Bravo Vision. 🚀


Check it out in Bravo Studio 👏

www.bravostudio.app
